newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Semen Gresik sets 400 bln rupiah bond.
newsitem.headline: Semen Gresik sets 400 bln rupiah bond.

text.p: Indonesia's Semen Gresik (Persero) has launched a 400 billion rupiah bond in two tranches, coordinator Merrill Lynch Indonesia said on Thursday.
Details are as follows:
TRANCHE I
AMT 200 BLN IDR COUPON 14.3 PCT MATURITY APR 2000
TYPE DOMESTIC BOND ISS PRICE PAR PAY DATE 30.APR.97
RATINGS NONE REOFFER PAR LAUNCH DATE 17.APR.97
PUTS/CALLS * PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LISTING NONE DENOMS 1 BLN IDR
SALE LIMITS INDONESIA/UK/US CAT2, REG S, TFRA D1
FULL FEES 60 BP MGT/UND 20BP SELL CONC 40BP
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ IPMA2
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY INDONESIA
TRANCHE II
AMT 200 BLN IDR COUPON 14.6 PCT MATURITY APR 2002
TYPE DOMESTIC BOND ISS PRICE PAR PAY DATE 30.APR.97
RATINGS NONE REOFFER PAR LAUNCH DATE 17.APR.97
PUTS/CALLS * PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LISTING NONE DENOMS 1 BLN IDR
SALE LIMITS INDONESIA/UK/US CAT2, REG S, TFRA D1
FULL FEES 70 BP MGT/UND 30BP SELL CONC 40BP
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ IPMA2
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY INDONESIA
*NOTES THE ISSUES CAN BE PUT IF THE GURANTOR CEASES TO BE
AT LEAST 51 PCT OWNED BY THE REPUBLIC OF INDONESIA.
THERE ARE NO CALL OPTIONS.
PLACEMENT AGENTS FOR THE ISSUE ARE PT MERRILL LYNCH
INDONESIA (50 PCT), PT BAHANA SECURITIES (16.7 PCT),
PT DANERESKA SEKURITAS (16.7 PCT), PT PENTASENA
ARTHASENTOSA (16.7 PCT).
-- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843-6371
